items.name: Radio Browser Skill
items.description: OCP skill for Radio Browser. Listen to various radio stations available on https://www.radio-browser.info

items.name: National Geographic Picture of the Day
items.description: National Geographic Picture of the Day
examples: National Geographic picture of the day

items.name: IHeartRadio
items.description: OCP skill for IHeartRadio. Note: IHeartRadio only provides podcasts outside the US.
examples: play the heavy metal hangover podcast

items.name: Number Guess
items.description: Play Number Guess with OVOS. OVOS generates a random number between a lower and upper bound, and you try to guess it.

items.name: Fairytalez
items.description: OVOS tells more than 2000 fairy tales, folk tales, and fables from all around the world.
examples: Tell me the story The Little Match Girl

items.name: OVOS Spotify skill
items.description: OCP skill for Spotify. This skill requires additional setup and components.

items.name: openHAB
items.description: This skill adds openHAB support to OVOS.
examples: tell me the temperature of Bedroom
I'd like to know the humidity of Bedroom
what is Main Thermostat is regulated to?
how the Main Thermostat tuned to?

items.name: Mouse Jiggler
items.description: Prevents your computer from going to sleep by creating constant mouse activity.

items.name: Shoutcast Skill
items.description: OCP skill for Shoutcast directory. Listen to various radio stations available on https://directory.shoutcast.com/

items.name: Bedtime Stories
items.description: Listen to famous bedtime stories.
examples: what bedtime stories do you know
read me little red riding hood

items.name: WikiHow Skill
items.description: How to do nearly everything.
examples: give me a random how to

items.name: Notes
items.description: GUI ONLY. Take personal notes to keep track of appointments, to-do items, etc.

items.name: Command Skill
items.description: A Simple OVOS skill for running shell scripts and other commands. The commands will run quietly without any confirmation from OVOS.

items.name: Quote of the Day
items.description: Quote of the day from They said so
examples: where do you get your quotes

items.name: Old World Radio
items.description: Old world radio skill.

items.name: ISS Tracker
items.description: Track the location of the ISS. Can also be used as an idle screen
examples: Who is on board of the space station
When is the ISS passing over
how many persons on board of the space station

items.name: Farting
items.description: OVOS will play a farting sound when requested or at random intervals. Just a fun skill that should generate a laugh or two.

items.name: Asteroid Tracker
items.description: Skill for tracking asteroids and their orbits.

items.name: Confucius Quotes
items.description: Quotes from Confucius

items.name: 8 Fact
items.description: Random Facts
examples: how many facts do you have in your database
where do you get your facts

items.name: Numbers
items.description: Facts about numbers, math, years and dates from http://numbersapi.com

items.name: XKCD Comics
items.description: Comics from xkcd.
examples: show me the latest xkcd comic

items.name: RSS Feed Reader
items.description: An overly complicated reader for RSS feeds. A skill allowing OVOS to fetch and read headlines and article summaries.
examples: what are the latest headlines from slashdot.org
read about elon musk's new project

items.name: Diagnostics
items.description: Aids you in diagnosing OVOS related issues. Provides various diagnostic functions such as checking CPU usage, drive space, public IP, uptime, etc.
examples: what is the current CPU percent?

items.name: Space is awesome
items.description: All about space. Ever wanted to know what's up? Now you can.
examples: How many discovered exoplanets orbiting M type stars
How many stars known to have planets
What do you know about space
How many active probes in space
Which probes do we have in space

items.name: Camera Skill (QML)
items.description: GUI ONLY! Take single-shot photographs with the Camera Skill.

items.name: Food Wizard
items.description: Get popular recipes and how-to-cook directions based on a combination of ingredient keywords. Powered by Edamam.
examples: search recipes with apple and honey
show recipes with chicken, honey and lime
open the recipe mexican chicken lime soup
read the current recipe cooking instructions

items.name: Daily Blue Marble
items.description: Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera provides near real-time pictures of earth from orbit. Can be used as homescreen.
examples: tell me about Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera
open the epic website from nasa
what is the location of DSCOVR spacecraft

items.name: Good Manners Enforcer
items.description: Responds to insults and good manners. Monitors utterances and reprimands insults / foul language, while showing appreciation for good manners.
examples: please something (X times in a row)

items.name: Helioviewer Skill
items.description: Access daily sunspot data and pictures from NASA's Solar and Heliospheric Observatory.
examples: Show me a picture of the solar corona

items.name: Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite
items.description: Near real time Satellite imagery from NASA's VIIRS
examples: show my house from space last month
explain the holes in the equator
talk about Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite

items.name: Cocktails
items.description: Get help mixing drinks. Let OVOS help you mix better and more fun drinks and cocktails.
examples: how do I mix a Moscow Mule
how do I make a daiquiri

items.name: Enclosure Control
items.description: Controls the enclosure API vocally. This skill can be used to trigger changes in the enclosure.

items.name: Coin Flip
items.description: This skill flips a virtual coin.

items.name: Astronomy Picture of the Day
items.description: NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day.

items.name: Pokemon
items.description: Aids you on your journey as a Pokemon Trainer. With this skill, you can ask OVOS many different facts about Pokemon.
examples: How much does Pikachu weigh in kilograms
How effective is a ground move against Pikachu?
What generation was Pichu introduced in?
What is Static's flavor text in emerald
What is Intimidate's flavor text in diamond
Give me some info about the ability Static
Give me some detailed information about the ability Static
What generation was Static first introduced?

items.name: Let's Talk
items.description: A skill for OVOS that replies to various greetings.

items.name: Stephen Hawking
items.description: Tribute to Stephen Hawking, quotes from a great mind

items.name: Wiktionary
items.description: Find definitions of words using Wiktionary.
examples: Tell me the definition of apple
What is the definition for orange

items.name: Fallback Cakechat
items.description: A fallback that utilizes the CakeChat Emotional Generative Dialog System
examples: what is the meaning of life

items.name: Count
items.description: Count and countdown skill. Let OVOS count to a number or countdown from a number.

items.name: Pickup Lines
items.description: Pickup lines from https://www.pickuplinesgalore.com/. Includes idle screen.
examples: say a lord of the rings pickup line
where do you get your pickup lines

items.name: Librivox Skill
items.description: Librivox skill for OCP. Search Librivox by voice!

items.name: Names
items.description: Says English names, OVOS can now help name your characters

items.name: Inspirational Quotes
items.description: Get inspired with quotes from Forismatic.

items.name: Today In History
items.description: Informs you of historical tidbits about a given calendar day. Provides historical events for today or any other calendar day using information pulled from Wikipedia.
examples: Tell me about events in history on December 12th
What historical events happened on June 16th?

items.name: Cat Skill
items.description: The Cat Skill fetches a random cat image from the Cat API and displays it on compatible devices.
examples: I want to see a kitty

items.name: wikiquote-skill
items.description: Gives quotations from notable people using Wikiquote. Supported languages are English, German, Spanish, French, Italian.
examples: Tell me a quote from Lincoln

items.name: Routines
items.description: Create and schedule a list of actions your assistant should perform, on your selected days and time.

items.name: Countries
items.description: Data about countries from http://restcountries.eu/. Provides information about country population, area, language, borders, currency, timezone, capital, denonyms, etc.
examples: what is the size of portugal
what are the borders of portugal
what is the capital of portugal
what is the currency of portugal
what is the language of portugal
what is the population of portugal
what is the timezone of portugal
what are the people that live in portugal called
how many countries do you know about
what are the countries in europe

items.name: Desktop Control
items.description: Control your mouse and keyboard by voice.

items.name: Algorithmic Art Skill
items.description: Creating art from math.
